name: games-on-whales
tagline: A framework that orchestrates containerized Windows gaming environments on Linux
description: WOLF (Whales On Linux Framework) orchestrates Docker containers that simulate Windows gaming environments for Linux. It helps automate game installations via Wine or Proton in self-contained sandboxed setups.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Automate Docker-based Windows gaming environments with Wine or Proton integration for seamless Linux gameplay

features.title: Linux Gaming Framework
features.description: Run Windows games natively on Linux through containerized environments with minimal configuration

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Enable remote streaming of Windows games from Linux hosts with low-latency performance

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Deploy your own game streaming infrastructure without relying on cloud services
